Item ID4803

Rune brutal arrows are used to kill Zogres (located south of Castle Wars). They are made by combining flighted ogre arrows and rune nails. Players can make these arrows with level 77 Fletching. Each arrow grants 12.5 experience.

Like all brutal arrows, these arrows can only be fired from a Composite ogre bow, but are more powerful than regular Rune arrows. If you try to use them with an ordinary Ogre Bow it will say that the bow isn't powerful enough to use these arrows. Players will often use them against Zogres because they are extremely effective against them.

[[File:Rune brutal detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Rune brutal arrows''' are used to kill [[Zogre]]s (located south of [[Castle Wars]]). They are made by combining [[flighted ogre arrow]]s and [[rune nails]]. Players can make these arrows with level 77 [[Fletching]]. Each arrow grants 12.5 experience.

Like all brutal arrows, these arrows can only be fired from a [[Composite ogre bow]], but are more powerful than regular Rune arrows. If you try to use them with an ordinary Ogre Bow it will say that the bow isn't powerful enough to use these arrows. Players will often use them against Zogres because they are extremely effective against them.
